add_namespace = nova_legion_faction_events

country_event = {
	id = nova_legion_faction_events.1
	title = nova_legion_faction_events.1.t
	desc = nova_legion_faction_events.1.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Allow them to join.
	option = {
		name = nova_legion_faction_events.1.a

		# For now, AI will always accept new members.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] nova_legion_faction_events.1.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = nova_legion_faction_events.2 }
			join_nova_legion = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				every_other_country = {
					news_event = { id = nova_legion_faction_events.4 }
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] nova_legion_faction_events.1.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# Decline their request.
	option = {
		name = nova_legion_faction_events.1.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] nova_legion_faction_events.1.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = nova_legion_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] nova_legion_faction_events.1.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}

# Welcome aboard!

	id = nova_legion_faction_events.2
	title = nova_legion_faction_events.2.t
	desc = nova_legion_faction_events.2.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	}

# Hey everybody, come meet my new friend!
news_event = {
	id = nova_legion_faction_events.4
	title = nova_legion_faction_events.4.t
	desc = nova_legion_faction_events.4.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = nova_legion_faction_events.4.a
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = nova_legion_faction_events.5
	title = nova_legion_faction_events.5.t
	desc = nova_legion_faction_events.5.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Sure, we'll join.
	option = {
		name = nova_legion_faction_events.5.a

		# For now, AI will always join.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] nova_legion_faction_events.5.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		join_from_faction = yes

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] nova_legion_faction_events.5.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# We work alone.
	option = {
		name = nova_legion_faction_events.5.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] nova_legion_faction_events.5.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = rejected_invitation_to_nova_legion }
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_nova_legion_member = yes }
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_opinion_modifier = {
						target = PREV
						modifier = rejected_invitation_to_nova_legion
					}
				}
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = PREV
					modifier = rejected_invitation_to_nova_legion
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = nova_legion_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] nova_legion_faction_events.5.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = chosen_ones_faction_events.1
	title = chosen_ones_faction_events.1.t
	desc = chosen_ones_faction_events.1.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Allow them to join.
	option = {
		name = chosen_ones_faction_events.1.a

		# For now, AI will always accept new members.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] chosen_ones_faction_events.1.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = chosen_ones_faction_events.2 }
			join_chosen_ones = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				every_other_country = {
					news_event = { id = chosen_ones_faction_events.4 }
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] chosen_ones_faction_events.1.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# Decline their request.
	option = {
		name = chosen_ones_faction_events.1.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] chosen_ones_faction_events.1.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = chosen_ones_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] chosen_ones_faction_events.1.b (event_option) exited"
		}

country_event = {
	id = chosen_ones_faction_events.5
	title = chosen_ones_faction_events.5.t
	desc = chosen_ones_faction_events.5.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Sure, we'll join.
	option = {
		name = chosen_ones_faction_events.5.a

		# For now, AI will always join.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] chosen_ones_faction_events.5.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		join_from_faction = yes

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] chosen_ones_faction_events.5.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# We work alone.
	option = {
		name = chosen_ones_faction_events.5.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] chosen_ones_faction_events.5.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = rejected_invitation_to_chosen_ones }
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_chosen_ones_member = yes }
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_opinion_modifier = {
						target = PREV
						modifier = rejected_invitation_to_chosen_ones
					}
				}
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = PREV
					modifier = rejected_invitation_to_chosen_ones
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = chosen_ones_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] chosen_ones_faction_events.5.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = lanius_horde_faction_events.5
	title = lanius_horde_faction_events.5.t
	desc = lanius_horde_faction_events.5.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Sure, we'll join.
	option = {
		name = lanius_horde_faction_events.5.a

		# For now, AI will always join.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] lanius_horde_faction_events.5.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		join_from_faction = yes

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] lanius_horde_faction_events.5.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# We work alone.
	option = {
		name = lanius_horde_faction_events.5.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] lanius_horde_faction_events.5.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = rejected_invitation_to_lanius_horde }
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_lanius_horde_member = yes }
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_opinion_modifier = {
						target = PREV
						modifier = rejected_invitation_to_lanius_horde
					}
				}
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = PREV
					modifier = rejected_invitation_to_lanius_horde
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = lanius_horde_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] lanius_horde_faction_events.5.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

country_event = {
	id = big_mt_faction_events.1
	title = big_mt_faction_events.1.t
	desc = big_mt_faction_events.1.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Allow them to join.
	option = {
		name = big_mt_faction_events.1.a

		# For now, AI will always accept new members.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] big_mt_faction_events.1.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = big_mt_faction_events.2 }
			join_big_mt = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				every_other_country = {
					news_event = { id = big_mt_faction_events.4 }
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] big_mt_faction_events.1.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# Decline their request.
	option = {
		name = big_mt_faction_events.1.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] big_mt_faction_events.1.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = big_mt_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] big_mt_faction_events.1.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}

				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		}

		}
	}

	# We work alone.
	option = {
		name = big_mt_faction_events.5.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] big_mt_faction_events.5.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = rejected_invitation_to_big_mt }
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_big_mt_member = yes }
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_opinion_modifier = {
						target = PREV
						modifier = rejected_invitation_to_big_mt
					}
				}
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = PREV
					modifier = rejected_invitation_to_big_mt
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = big_mt_faction_events.3 }
		}

			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] big_mt_faction_events.5.b (event_option) exited"
		}

country_event = {
	id = boneyard_brotherhood_faction_events.1
	title = boneyard_brotherhood_faction_events.1.t
	desc = boneyard_brotherhood_faction_events.1.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Allow them to join.
	option = {
		name = boneyard_brotherhood_faction_events.1.a

		# For now, AI will always accept new members.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] boneyard_brotherhood_faction_events.1.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = boneyard_brotherhood_faction_events.2 }
			join_boneyard_brotherhood = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				every_other_country = {
					news_event = { id = boneyard_brotherhood_faction_events.4 }
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] boneyard_brotherhood_faction_events.1.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# Decline their request.
	option = {
		name = boneyard_brotherhood_faction_events.1.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] boneyard_brotherhood_faction_events.1.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = boneyard_brotherhood_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] boneyard_brotherhood_faction_events.1.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}

# Welcome aboard!
news_event = {
	id = boneyard_brotherhood_faction_events.2
	title = boneyard_brotherhood_faction_events.2.t
	desc = boneyard_brotherhood_faction_events.2.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = boneyard_brotherhood_faction_events.2.a
	}
}

# No thanks, we'll pass.
news_event = {
	id = boneyard_brotherhood_faction_events.3
	title = boneyard_brotherhood_faction_events.3.t
	desc = boneyard_brotherhood_faction_events.3.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = boneyard_brotherhood_faction_events.3.a
	}
}

# Hey everybody, come meet my new friend!
news_event = {
	id = boneyard_brotherhood_faction_events.4
	title = boneyard_brotherhood_faction_events.4.t
	desc = boneyard_brotherhood_faction_events.4.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = boneyard_brotherhood_faction_events.4.a
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = boneyard_brotherhood_faction_events.5
	title = boneyard_brotherhood_faction_events.5.t
	desc = boneyard_brotherhood_faction_events.5.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Sure, we'll join.
	option = {
		name = boneyard_brotherhood_faction_events.5.a

		# For now, AI will always join.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] boneyard_brotherhood_faction_events.5.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		join_from_faction = yes

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] boneyard_brotherhood_faction_events.5.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# We work alone.
	option = {
		name = boneyard_brotherhood_faction_events.5.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] boneyard_brotherhood_faction_events.5.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = rejected_invitation_to_boneyard_brotherhood }
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_boneyard_brotherhood_member = yes }
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_opinion_modifier = {
						target = PREV
						modifier = rejected_invitation_to_boneyard_brotherhood
					}
				}
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = PREV
					modifier = rejected_invitation_to_boneyard_brotherhood
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = boneyard_brotherhood_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] boneyard_brotherhood_faction_events.5.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}
add_namespace = united_front_faction_events

country_event = {
	id = united_front_faction_events.1
	title = united_front_faction_events.1.t
	desc = united_front_faction_events.1.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Allow them to join.
	option = {
		name = united_front_faction_events.1.a

		# For now, AI will always accept new members.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] united_front_faction_events.1.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = united_front_faction_events.2 }
			join_united_front = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				every_other_country = {
					news_event = { id = united_front_faction_events.4 }
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] united_front_faction_events.1.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# Decline their request.
	option = {
		name = united_front_faction_events.1.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] united_front_faction_events.1.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = united_front_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] united_front_faction_events.1.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = united_front_faction_events.5
	title = united_front_faction_events.5.t
	desc = united_front_faction_events.5.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Sure, we'll join.
	option = {
		name = united_front_faction_events.5.a

		# For now, AI will always join.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] united_front_faction_events.5.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		join_from_faction = yes

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] united_front_faction_events.5.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# We work alone.
	option = {
		name = united_front_faction_events.5.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] united_front_faction_events.5.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = rejected_invitation_to_united_front }
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_united_front_member = yes }
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_opinion_modifier = {
						target = PREV
						modifier = rejected_invitation_to_united_front
					}
				}
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = PREV
					modifier = rejected_invitation_to_united_front
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = united_front_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] united_front_faction_events.5.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}

	id = caesars_legion_faction_events.1
	title = caesars_legion_faction_events.1.t
	desc = caesars_legion_faction_events.1.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Allow them to join.

		# For now, AI will always accept new members.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] caesars_legion_faction_events.1.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.

			news_event = { id = caesars_legion_faction_events.2 }
			join_caesars_legion = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				every_other_country = {
					news_event = { id = caesars_legion_faction_events.4 }

		}
	}

			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}

country_event = {
	id = children_of_mexico_faction_events.1
	title = children_of_mexico_faction_events.1.t
	desc = children_of_mexico_faction_events.1.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Allow them to join.
	option = {
		name = children_of_mexico_faction_events.1.a

		# For now, AI will always accept new members.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] children_of_mexico_faction_events.1.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = children_of_mexico_faction_events.2 }
			join_children_of_mexico = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				every_other_country = {
					news_event = { id = children_of_mexico_faction_events.4 }
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] children_of_mexico_faction_events.1.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# Decline their request.
	option = {
		name = children_of_mexico_faction_events.1.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] children_of_mexico_faction_events.1.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = children_of_mexico_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] children_of_mexico_faction_events.1.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}

# Welcome aboard!
news_event = {
	id = children_of_mexico_faction_events.2
	title = children_of_mexico_faction_events.2.t
	desc = children_of_mexico_faction_events.2.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = children_of_mexico_faction_events.2.a
	}
}

# No thanks, we'll pass.
news_event = {
	id = children_of_mexico_faction_events.3
	title = children_of_mexico_faction_events.3.t
	desc = children_of_mexico_faction_events.3.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = children_of_mexico_faction_events.3.a
	}
}

# Hey everybody, come meet my new friend!
news_event = {
	id = children_of_mexico_faction_events.4
	title = children_of_mexico_faction_events.4.t
	desc = children_of_mexico_faction_events.4.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = children_of_mexico_faction_events.4.a
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = children_of_mexico_faction_events.5
	title = children_of_mexico_faction_events.5.t
	desc = children_of_mexico_faction_events.5.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Sure, we'll join.
	option = {
		name = children_of_mexico_faction_events.5.a

		# For now, AI will always join.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] children_of_mexico_faction_events.5.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		join_from_faction = yes

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] children_of_mexico_faction_events.5.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# We work alone.
	option = {
		name = children_of_mexico_faction_events.5.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] children_of_mexico_faction_events.5.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = rejected_invitation_to_children_of_mexico }
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_children_of_mexico_member = yes }
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_opinion_modifier = {
						target = PREV
						modifier = rejected_invitation_to_children_of_mexico
					}
				}
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = PREV
					modifier = rejected_invitation_to_children_of_mexico
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = children_of_mexico_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] children_of_mexico_faction_events.5.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}
add_namespace = children_of_the_gate_faction_events

country_event = {
	id = children_of_the_gate_faction_events.1
	title = children_of_the_gate_faction_events.1.t
	desc = children_of_the_gate_faction_events.1.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Allow them to join.
	option = {
		name = children_of_the_gate_faction_events.1.a

		# For now, AI will always accept new members.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] children_of_the_gate_faction_events.1.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = children_of_the_gate_faction_events.2 }
			join_children_of_the_gate = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				every_other_country = {
					news_event = { id = children_of_the_gate_faction_events.4 }
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] children_of_the_gate_faction_events.1.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# Decline their request.
	option = {
		name = children_of_the_gate_faction_events.1.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] children_of_the_gate_faction_events.1.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = children_of_the_gate_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] children_of_the_gate_faction_events.1.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}

# Welcome aboard!

	desc = children_of_the_gate_faction_events.4.d

	}

country_event = {
	id = children_of_the_gate_faction_events.5
	title = children_of_the_gate_faction_events.5.t
	desc = children_of_the_gate_faction_events.5.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Sure, we'll join.
	option = {
		name = children_of_the_gate_faction_events.5.a

		# For now, AI will always join.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] children_of_the_gate_faction_events.5.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		join_from_faction = yes

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] children_of_the_gate_faction_events.5.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# We work alone.
	option = {
		name = children_of_the_gate_faction_events.5.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] children_of_the_gate_faction_events.5.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = rejected_invitation_to_children_of_the_gate }
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_children_of_the_gate_member = yes }
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_opinion_modifier = {
						target = PREV
						modifier = rejected_invitation_to_children_of_the_gate
					}
				}
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = PREV
					modifier = rejected_invitation_to_children_of_the_gate
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = children_of_the_gate_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] children_of_the_gate_faction_events.5.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = daikatana_faction_events.1
	title = daikatana_faction_events.1.t
	desc = daikatana_faction_events.1.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Allow them to join.

		name = daikatana_faction_events.1.a

		# For now, AI will always accept new members.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {

			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] daikatana_faction_events.1.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = daikatana_faction_events.2 }
			join_daikatana = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				every_other_country = {
					news_event = { id = daikatana_faction_events.4 }
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] daikatana_faction_events.1.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# Decline their request.

		name = daikatana_faction_events.1.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

	desc = daikatana_faction_events.5.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Sure, we'll join.

		name = daikatana_faction_events.5.a

		# For now, AI will always join.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] daikatana_faction_events.5.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		join_from_faction = yes

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] daikatana_faction_events.5.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# We work alone.
	option = {
		name = daikatana_faction_events.5.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] daikatana_faction_events.5.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = rejected_invitation_to_daikatana }
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_daikatana_member = yes }
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_opinion_modifier = {
						target = PREV
						modifier = rejected_invitation_to_daikatana
					}
				}
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = PREV
					modifier = rejected_invitation_to_daikatana
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {

			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] daikatana_faction_events.5.b (event_option) exited"
		}

country_event = {
	id = daughters_of_hecate_faction_events.1
	title = daughters_of_hecate_faction_events.1.t
	desc = daughters_of_hecate_faction_events.1.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Allow them to join.
	option = {
		name = daughters_of_hecate_faction_events.1.a

		# For now, AI will always accept new members.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] daughters_of_hecate_faction_events.1.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = daughters_of_hecate_faction_events.2 }
			join_daughters_of_hecate = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				every_other_country = {
					news_event = { id = daughters_of_hecate_faction_events.4 }
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] daughters_of_hecate_faction_events.1.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# Decline their request.
	option = {
		name = daughters_of_hecate_faction_events.1.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] daughters_of_hecate_faction_events.1.b (event_option) entered"
		}

				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = rejected_invitation_to_daughters_of_hecate }
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_daughters_of_hecate_member = yes }

						target = PREV

country_event = {
	id = denver_defense_network_faction_events.1
	title = denver_defense_network_faction_events.1.t
	desc = denver_defense_network_faction_events.1.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Allow them to join.
	option = {
		name = denver_defense_network_faction_events.1.a

		# For now, AI will always accept new members.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] denver_defense_network_faction_events.1.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = denver_defense_network_faction_events.2 }
			join_denver_defense_network = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				every_other_country = {
					news_event = { id = denver_defense_network_faction_events.4 }
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] denver_defense_network_faction_events.1.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# Decline their request.
	option = {
		name = denver_defense_network_faction_events.1.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] denver_defense_network_faction_events.1.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = denver_defense_network_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] denver_defense_network_faction_events.1.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}

# Welcome aboard!
news_event = {
	id = denver_defense_network_faction_events.2
	title = denver_defense_network_faction_events.2.t
	desc = denver_defense_network_faction_events.2.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = denver_defense_network_faction_events.2.a
	}
}

# No thanks, we'll pass.
news_event = {
	id = denver_defense_network_faction_events.3
	title = denver_defense_network_faction_events.3.t
	desc = denver_defense_network_faction_events.3.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = denver_defense_network_faction_events.3.a
	}
}

# Hey everybody, come meet my new friend!
news_event = {
	id = denver_defense_network_faction_events.4
	title = denver_defense_network_faction_events.4.t
	desc = denver_defense_network_faction_events.4.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = denver_defense_network_faction_events.4.a
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = denver_defense_network_faction_events.5
	title = denver_defense_network_faction_events.5.t
	desc = denver_defense_network_faction_events.5.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Sure, we'll join.
	option = {
		name = denver_defense_network_faction_events.5.a

		# For now, AI will always join.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] denver_defense_network_faction_events.5.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		join_from_faction = yes

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] denver_defense_network_faction_events.5.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# We work alone.
	option = {
		name = denver_defense_network_faction_events.5.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] denver_defense_network_faction_events.5.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = rejected_invitation_to_denver_defense_network }
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_denver_defense_network_member = yes }
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_opinion_modifier = {
						target = PREV
						modifier = rejected_invitation_to_denver_defense_network
					}
				}
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = PREV
					modifier = rejected_invitation_to_denver_defense_network
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = denver_defense_network_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] denver_defense_network_faction_events.5.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}
add_namespace = earth_and_sky_faction_events

country_event = {
	id = earth_and_sky_faction_events.1
	title = earth_and_sky_faction_events.1.t
	desc = earth_and_sky_faction_events.1.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Allow them to join.
	option = {
		name = earth_and_sky_faction_events.1.a

		# For now, AI will always accept new members.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] earth_and_sky_faction_events.1.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = earth_and_sky_faction_events.2 }
			join_earth_and_sky = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				every_other_country = {
					news_event = { id = earth_and_sky_faction_events.4 }
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] earth_and_sky_faction_events.1.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# Decline their request.
	option = {
		name = earth_and_sky_faction_events.1.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] earth_and_sky_faction_events.1.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = earth_and_sky_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] earth_and_sky_faction_events.1.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}

# Welcome aboard!

country_event = {
	id = earth_and_sky_faction_events.5
	title = earth_and_sky_faction_events.5.t
	desc = earth_and_sky_faction_events.5.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Sure, we'll join.
	option = {
		name = earth_and_sky_faction_events.5.a

		# For now, AI will always join.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] earth_and_sky_faction_events.5.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		join_from_faction = yes

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] earth_and_sky_faction_events.5.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# We work alone.
	option = {
		name = earth_and_sky_faction_events.5.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] earth_and_sky_faction_events.5.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = rejected_invitation_to_earth_and_sky }
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_earth_and_sky_member = yes }
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_opinion_modifier = {
						target = PREV
						modifier = rejected_invitation_to_earth_and_sky
					}
				}
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = PREV
					modifier = rejected_invitation_to_earth_and_sky
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = earth_and_sky_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] earth_and_sky_faction_events.5.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}

	desc = empire_of_salt_faction_events.1.d

				factor = 1

			hidden_effect = {
				every_other_country = {
					news_event = { id = empire_of_salt_faction_events.4 }

			modifier = {
				factor = 0

country_event = {
	id = equestria_faction_events.1
	title = equestria_faction_events.1.t
	desc = equestria_faction_events.1.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Allow them to join.
	option = {
		name = equestria_faction_events.1.a

		# For now, AI will always accept new members.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] equestria_faction_events.1.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = equestria_faction_events.2 }
			join_equestria = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				every_other_country = {
					news_event = { id = equestria_faction_events.4 }
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] equestria_faction_events.1.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# Decline their request.
	option = {
		name = equestria_faction_events.1.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] equestria_faction_events.1.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = equestria_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] equestria_faction_events.1.b (event_option) exited"

			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] equestria_faction_events.5.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		join_from_faction = yes

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }

			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] equestria_faction_events.5.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = rejected_invitation_to_equestria }
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_equestria_member = yes }
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_opinion_modifier = {
						target = PREV
						modifier = rejected_invitation_to_equestria
					}
				}
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = PREV
					modifier = rejected_invitation_to_equestria
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = equestria_faction_events.3 }

			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] equestria_faction_events.5.b (event_option) exited"
		}

country_event = {
	id = faithful_faction_events.1
	title = faithful_faction_events.1.t
	desc = faithful_faction_events.1.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Allow them to join.
	option = {
		name = faithful_faction_events.1.a

		# For now, AI will always accept new members.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] faithful_faction_events.1.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = faithful_faction_events.2 }
			join_faithful = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				every_other_country = {
					news_event = { id = faithful_faction_events.4 }
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] faithful_faction_events.1.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# Decline their request.
	option = {
		name = faithful_faction_events.1.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] faithful_faction_events.1.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = faithful_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] faithful_faction_events.1.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	id = faithful_faction_events.3

	desc = faithful_faction_events.3.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

}

# Hey everybody, come meet my new friend!
news_event = {
	id = faithful_faction_events.4
	title = faithful_faction_events.4.t
	desc = faithful_faction_events.4.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = faithful_faction_events.4.a
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = faithful_faction_events.5
	title = faithful_faction_events.5.t
	desc = faithful_faction_events.5.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Sure, we'll join.
	option = {
		name = faithful_faction_events.5.a

		# For now, AI will always join.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] faithful_faction_events.5.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		join_from_faction = yes

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] faithful_faction_events.5.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# We work alone.
	option = {
		name = faithful_faction_events.5.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] faithful_faction_events.5.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = rejected_invitation_to_faithful }
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_faithful_member = yes }
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_opinion_modifier = {
						target = PREV
						modifier = rejected_invitation_to_faithful
					}
				}
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = PREV
					modifier = rejected_invitation_to_faithful
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = faithful_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] faithful_faction_events.5.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}
add_namespace = fantasma_cartel_faction_events

country_event = {
	id = fantasma_cartel_faction_events.1
	title = fantasma_cartel_faction_events.1.t
	desc = fantasma_cartel_faction_events.1.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Allow them to join.
	option = {
		name = fantasma_cartel_faction_events.1.a

		# For now, AI will always accept new members.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] fantasma_cartel_faction_events.1.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = fantasma_cartel_faction_events.2 }
			join_fantasma_cartel = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				every_other_country = {
					news_event = { id = fantasma_cartel_faction_events.4 }
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] fantasma_cartel_faction_events.1.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# Decline their request.
	option = {
		name = fantasma_cartel_faction_events.1.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] fantasma_cartel_faction_events.1.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = fantasma_cartel_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] fantasma_cartel_faction_events.1.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}

# Welcome aboard!

	id = fantasma_cartel_faction_events.2
	title = fantasma_cartel_faction_events.2.t
	desc = fantasma_cartel_faction_events.2.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

		name = fantasma_cartel_faction_events.2.a
	}

	id = fantasma_cartel_faction_events.4
	title = fantasma_cartel_faction_events.4.t
	desc = fantasma_cartel_faction_events.4.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = fantasma_cartel_faction_events.4.a
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = fantasma_cartel_faction_events.5
	title = fantasma_cartel_faction_events.5.t
	desc = fantasma_cartel_faction_events.5.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Sure, we'll join.
	option = {
		name = fantasma_cartel_faction_events.5.a

		# For now, AI will always join.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] fantasma_cartel_faction_events.5.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		join_from_faction = yes

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] fantasma_cartel_faction_events.5.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# We work alone.
	option = {
		name = fantasma_cartel_faction_events.5.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] fantasma_cartel_faction_events.5.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = rejected_invitation_to_fantasma_cartel }
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_fantasma_cartel_member = yes }
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_opinion_modifier = {
						target = PREV
						modifier = rejected_invitation_to_fantasma_cartel
					}
				}
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = PREV
					modifier = rejected_invitation_to_fantasma_cartel
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = fantasma_cartel_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] fantasma_cartel_faction_events.5.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = glass_league_faction_events.1
	title = glass_league_faction_events.1.t
	desc = glass_league_faction_events.1.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Allow them to join.
	option = {
		name = glass_league_faction_events.1.a

		# For now, AI will always accept new members.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] glass_league_faction_events.1.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = glass_league_faction_events.2 }
			join_glass_league = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				every_other_country = {
					news_event = { id = glass_league_faction_events.4 }
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] glass_league_faction_events.1.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# Decline their request.
	option = {
		name = glass_league_faction_events.1.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] glass_league_faction_events.1.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		FROM = {

country_event = {
	id = glass_league_faction_events.5
	title = glass_league_faction_events.5.t
	desc = glass_league_faction_events.5.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Sure, we'll join.
	option = {
		name = glass_league_faction_events.5.a

		# For now, AI will always join.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] glass_league_faction_events.5.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		join_from_faction = yes

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] glass_league_faction_events.5.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# We work alone.
	option = {
		name = glass_league_faction_events.5.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] glass_league_faction_events.5.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = rejected_invitation_to_glass_league }
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_glass_league_member = yes }
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_opinion_modifier = {
						target = PREV
						modifier = rejected_invitation_to_glass_league
					}
				}
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = PREV
					modifier = rejected_invitation_to_glass_league
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = glass_league_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] glass_league_faction_events.5.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

country_event = {
	id = great_federation_faction_events.1
	title = great_federation_faction_events.1.t
	desc = great_federation_faction_events.1.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Allow them to join.

		name = great_federation_faction_events.1.a

		# For now, AI will always accept new members.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] great_federation_faction_events.1.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = great_federation_faction_events.2 }
			join_great_federation = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				every_other_country = {
					news_event = { id = great_federation_faction_events.4 }
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] great_federation_faction_events.1.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# Decline their request.
	option = {
		name = great_federation_faction_events.1.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] great_federation_faction_events.1.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = great_federation_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] great_federation_faction_events.1.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

country_event = {
	id = great_federation_faction_events.5
	title = great_federation_faction_events.5.t
	desc = great_federation_faction_events.5.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Sure, we'll join.
	option = {
		name = great_federation_faction_events.5.a

		# For now, AI will always join.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] great_federation_faction_events.5.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		join_from_faction = yes

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] great_federation_faction_events.5.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# We work alone.
	option = {
		name = great_federation_faction_events.5.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] great_federation_faction_events.5.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = rejected_invitation_to_great_federation }
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_great_federation_member = yes }
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_opinion_modifier = {
						target = PREV
						modifier = rejected_invitation_to_great_federation
					}
				}
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = PREV
					modifier = rejected_invitation_to_great_federation
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = great_federation_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] great_federation_faction_events.5.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}

	desc = great_plains_federation_faction_events.1.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1

			}
		}

		}

			join_great_plains_federation = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				every_other_country = {
					news_event = { id = great_plains_federation_faction_events.4 }
				}
			}
		}

			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] great_plains_federation_faction_events.1.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# Decline their request.
	option = {
		name = great_plains_federation_faction_events.1.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] great_plains_federation_faction_events.1.b (event_option) entered"
		}

			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] great_plains_federation_faction_events.5.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		join_from_faction = yes

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] great_plains_federation_faction_events.5.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# We work alone.
	option = {
		name = great_plains_federation_faction_events.5.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] great_plains_federation_faction_events.5.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = rejected_invitation_to_great_plains_federation }
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_great_plains_federation_member = yes }
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_opinion_modifier = {
						target = PREV
						modifier = rejected_invitation_to_great_plains_federation
					}
				}
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = PREV
					modifier = rejected_invitation_to_great_plains_federation
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = great_plains_federation_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] great_plains_federation_faction_events.5.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}
add_namespace = jungle_pact_faction_events

country_event = {
	id = jungle_pact_faction_events.1
	title = jungle_pact_faction_events.1.t
	desc = jungle_pact_faction_events.1.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Allow them to join.
	option = {
		name = jungle_pact_faction_events.1.a

		# For now, AI will always accept new members.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] jungle_pact_faction_events.1.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = jungle_pact_faction_events.2 }
			join_jungle_pact = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				every_other_country = {
					news_event = { id = jungle_pact_faction_events.4 }
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] jungle_pact_faction_events.1.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# Decline their request.
	option = {
		name = jungle_pact_faction_events.1.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] jungle_pact_faction_events.1.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = jungle_pact_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] jungle_pact_faction_events.1.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}

news_event = {
	id = jungle_pact_faction_events.4
	title = jungle_pact_faction_events.4.t
	desc = jungle_pact_faction_events.4.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = jungle_pact_faction_events.4.a
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = jungle_pact_faction_events.5
	title = jungle_pact_faction_events.5.t
	desc = jungle_pact_faction_events.5.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Sure, we'll join.
	option = {
		name = jungle_pact_faction_events.5.a

		# For now, AI will always join.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] jungle_pact_faction_events.5.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		join_from_faction = yes

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] jungle_pact_faction_events.5.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# We work alone.
	option = {
		name = jungle_pact_faction_events.5.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] jungle_pact_faction_events.5.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = rejected_invitation_to_jungle_pact }
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_jungle_pact_member = yes }
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_opinion_modifier = {
						target = PREV
						modifier = rejected_invitation_to_jungle_pact
					}
				}
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = PREV
					modifier = rejected_invitation_to_jungle_pact
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = jungle_pact_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] jungle_pact_faction_events.5.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] mesoamerican_alliance_faction_events.5.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = rejected_invitation_to_mesoamerican_alliance }
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_mesoamerican_alliance_member = yes }
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_opinion_modifier = {
						target = PREV
						modifier = rejected_invitation_to_mesoamerican_alliance
					}
				}
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = PREV
					modifier = rejected_invitation_to_mesoamerican_alliance
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = mesoamerican_alliance_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] mesoamerican_alliance_faction_events.5.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}
add_namespace = the_fire_council_faction_events

country_event = {
	id = the_fire_council_faction_events.1
	title = the_fire_council_faction_events.1.t
	desc = the_fire_council_faction_events.1.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Allow them to join.
	option = {
		name = the_fire_council_faction_events.1.a

		# For now, AI will always accept new members.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] the_fire_council_faction_events.1.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = the_fire_council_faction_events.2 }
			join_the_fire_council = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				every_other_country = {
					news_event = { id = the_fire_council_faction_events.4 }
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] the_fire_council_faction_events.1.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# Decline their request.
	option = {
		name = the_fire_council_faction_events.1.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] the_fire_council_faction_events.1.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = the_fire_council_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] the_fire_council_faction_events.1.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}

# Welcome aboard!
news_event = {
	id = the_fire_council_faction_events.2
	title = the_fire_council_faction_events.2.t
	desc = the_fire_council_faction_events.2.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = the_fire_council_faction_events.2.a
	}
}

news_event = {
	id = the_fire_council_faction_events.3
	title = the_fire_council_faction_events.3.t
	desc = the_fire_council_faction_events.3.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = the_fire_council_faction_events.3.a
	}
}

# Hey everybody, come meet my new friend!
news_event = {
	id = the_fire_council_faction_events.4
	title = the_fire_council_faction_events.4.t
	desc = the_fire_council_faction_events.4.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = the_fire_council_faction_events.4.a
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = the_fire_council_faction_events.5
	title = the_fire_council_faction_events.5.t
	desc = the_fire_council_faction_events.5.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Sure, we'll join.
	option = {
		name = the_fire_council_faction_events.5.a

		# For now, AI will always join.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] the_fire_council_faction_events.5.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		join_from_faction = yes

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] the_fire_council_faction_events.5.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# We work alone.
	option = {
		name = the_fire_council_faction_events.5.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] the_fire_council_faction_events.5.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = rejected_invitation_to_the_fire_council }
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_the_fire_council_member = yes }
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_opinion_modifier = {
						target = PREV
						modifier = rejected_invitation_to_the_fire_council
					}
				}
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = PREV
					modifier = rejected_invitation_to_the_fire_council
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = the_fire_council_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] the_fire_council_faction_events.5.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}
add_namespace = mojave_alliance_faction_events

country_event = {
	id = mojave_alliance_faction_events.1
	title = mojave_alliance_faction_events.1.t
	desc = mojave_alliance_faction_events.1.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Allow them to join.
	option = {
		name = mojave_alliance_faction_events.1.a

		# For now, AI will always accept new members.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] mojave_alliance_faction_events.1.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = mojave_alliance_faction_events.2 }
			join_mojave_alliance = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				every_other_country = {
					news_event = { id = mojave_alliance_faction_events.4 }
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] mojave_alliance_faction_events.1.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# Decline their request.
	option = {
		name = mojave_alliance_faction_events.1.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] mojave_alliance_faction_events.1.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = mojave_alliance_faction_events.3 }

			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] mojave_alliance_faction_events.1.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

country_event = {
	id = mojave_alliance_faction_events.5
	title = mojave_alliance_faction_events.5.t
	desc = mojave_alliance_faction_events.5.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Sure, we'll join.
	option = {
		name = mojave_alliance_faction_events.5.a

		# For now, AI will always join.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] mojave_alliance_faction_events.5.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		join_from_faction = yes

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] mojave_alliance_faction_events.5.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# We work alone.
	option = {
		name = mojave_alliance_faction_events.5.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] mojave_alliance_faction_events.5.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = rejected_invitation_to_mojave_alliance }
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_mojave_alliance_member = yes }
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_opinion_modifier = {
						target = PREV
						modifier = rejected_invitation_to_mojave_alliance
					}
				}
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = PREV
					modifier = rejected_invitation_to_mojave_alliance
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = mojave_alliance_faction_events.3 }
		}

			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] mojave_alliance_faction_events.5.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1

			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_nevada_enclave_member = yes }
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_opinion_modifier = {
						target = PREV
						modifier = rejected_invitation_to_nevada_enclave
					}
				}
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = PREV
					modifier = rejected_invitation_to_nevada_enclave
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = nevada_enclave_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] nevada_enclave_faction_events.5.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}
add_namespace = nevada_pact_faction_events

country_event = {
	id = nevada_pact_faction_events.1
	title = nevada_pact_faction_events.1.t
	desc = nevada_pact_faction_events.1.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Allow them to join.
	option = {
		name = nevada_pact_faction_events.1.a

		# For now, AI will always accept new members.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] nevada_pact_faction_events.1.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = nevada_pact_faction_events.2 }
			join_nevada_pact = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				every_other_country = {
					news_event = { id = nevada_pact_faction_events.4 }
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] nevada_pact_faction_events.1.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# Decline their request.
	option = {
		name = nevada_pact_faction_events.1.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] nevada_pact_faction_events.1.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = nevada_pact_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] nevada_pact_faction_events.1.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}

# Welcome aboard!
news_event = {
	id = nevada_pact_faction_events.2
	title = nevada_pact_faction_events.2.t
	desc = nevada_pact_faction_events.2.d

	}

	id = nevada_pact_faction_events.3
	title = nevada_pact_faction_events.3.t
	desc = nevada_pact_faction_events.3.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	}
}

# Hey everybody, come meet my new friend!
news_event = {
	id = nevada_pact_faction_events.4
	title = nevada_pact_faction_events.4.t
	desc = nevada_pact_faction_events.4.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = nevada_pact_faction_events.4.a
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = nevada_pact_faction_events.5
	title = nevada_pact_faction_events.5.t
	desc = nevada_pact_faction_events.5.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Sure, we'll join.
	option = {
		name = nevada_pact_faction_events.5.a

		# For now, AI will always join.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] nevada_pact_faction_events.5.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		join_from_faction = yes

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] nevada_pact_faction_events.5.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# We work alone.
	option = {
		name = nevada_pact_faction_events.5.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] nevada_pact_faction_events.5.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = rejected_invitation_to_nevada_pact }
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_nevada_pact_member = yes }
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_opinion_modifier = {
						target = PREV
						modifier = rejected_invitation_to_nevada_pact
					}
				}
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = PREV
					modifier = rejected_invitation_to_nevada_pact
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = nevada_pact_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] nevada_pact_faction_events.5.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = northern_league_faction_events.1
	title = northern_league_faction_events.1.t
	desc = northern_league_faction_events.1.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Allow them to join.
	option = {
		name = northern_league_faction_events.1.a

		# For now, AI will always accept new members.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] northern_league_faction_events.1.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = northern_league_faction_events.2 }
			join_northern_league = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				every_other_country = {
					news_event = { id = northern_league_faction_events.4 }
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] northern_league_faction_events.1.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# Decline their request.
	option = {
		name = northern_league_faction_events.1.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] northern_league_faction_events.1.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = northern_league_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] northern_league_faction_events.1.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
