country_event = {
	id = northern_league_faction_events.5
	title = northern_league_faction_events.5.t
	desc = northern_league_faction_events.5.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Sure, we'll join.
	option = {
		name = northern_league_faction_events.5.a

		# For now, AI will always join.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] northern_league_faction_events.5.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		join_from_faction = yes

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] northern_league_faction_events.5.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# We work alone.
	option = {
		name = northern_league_faction_events.5.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] northern_league_faction_events.5.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = rejected_invitation_to_northern_league }
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_northern_league_member = yes }
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_opinion_modifier = {
						target = PREV
						modifier = rejected_invitation_to_northern_league
					}
				}
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = PREV
					modifier = rejected_invitation_to_northern_league
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = northern_league_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] northern_league_faction_events.5.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}

			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		name = northern_mojave_pact_faction_events.5.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] northern_mojave_pact_faction_events.5.b (event_option) entered"

				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = rejected_invitation_to_northern_mojave_pact }
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_northern_mojave_pact_member = yes }
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_opinion_modifier = {
						target = PREV
						modifier = rejected_invitation_to_northern_mojave_pact
					}

			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1

		}

				factor = 0

			}
		}

			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] phoenix_federation_faction_events.5.b (event_option) entered"
		}

				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = rejected_invitation_to_phoenix_federation }
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_phoenix_federation_member = yes }

					}
				}
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = PREV

				}
			}

			news_event = { id = phoenix_federation_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] phoenix_federation_faction_events.5.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}
add_namespace = rio_pact_faction_events

country_event = {
	id = rio_pact_faction_events.1
	title = rio_pact_faction_events.1.t
	desc = rio_pact_faction_events.1.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Allow them to join.
	option = {
		name = rio_pact_faction_events.1.a

		# For now, AI will always accept new members.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] rio_pact_faction_events.1.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = rio_pact_faction_events.2 }
			join_rio_pact = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				every_other_country = {
					news_event = { id = rio_pact_faction_events.4 }
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] rio_pact_faction_events.1.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# Decline their request.
	option = {
		name = rio_pact_faction_events.1.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] rio_pact_faction_events.1.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = rio_pact_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] rio_pact_faction_events.1.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}

# Welcome aboard!
news_event = {
	id = rio_pact_faction_events.2
	title = rio_pact_faction_events.2.t
	desc = rio_pact_faction_events.2.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = rio_pact_faction_events.2.a
	}
}

# No thanks, we'll pass.
news_event = {
	id = rio_pact_faction_events.3
	title = rio_pact_faction_events.3.t
	desc = rio_pact_faction_events.3.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = rio_pact_faction_events.3.a
	}
}

# Hey everybody, come meet my new friend!
news_event = {
	id = rio_pact_faction_events.4
	title = rio_pact_faction_events.4.t
	desc = rio_pact_faction_events.4.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = rio_pact_faction_events.4.a
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = rio_pact_faction_events.5
	title = rio_pact_faction_events.5.t
	desc = rio_pact_faction_events.5.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Sure, we'll join.
	option = {
		name = rio_pact_faction_events.5.a

		# For now, AI will always join.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] rio_pact_faction_events.5.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		join_from_faction = yes

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] rio_pact_faction_events.5.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# We work alone.
	option = {
		name = rio_pact_faction_events.5.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] rio_pact_faction_events.5.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = rejected_invitation_to_rio_pact }
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_rio_pact_member = yes }
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_opinion_modifier = {
						target = PREV
						modifier = rejected_invitation_to_rio_pact
					}
				}
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = PREV
					modifier = rejected_invitation_to_rio_pact
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = rio_pact_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] rio_pact_faction_events.5.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}
add_namespace = senators_little_helpers_faction_events

	id = senators_little_helpers_faction_events.1

				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.

			news_event = { id = senators_little_helpers_faction_events.2 }
			join_senators_little_helpers = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				every_other_country = {
					news_event = { id = senators_little_helpers_faction_events.4 }
				}
			}
		}

			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] senators_little_helpers_faction_events.1.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

		name = senators_little_helpers_faction_events.1.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] senators_little_helpers_faction_events.1.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		FROM = {

country_event = {
	id = senators_little_helpers_faction_events.5
	title = senators_little_helpers_faction_events.5.t
	desc = senators_little_helpers_faction_events.5.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Sure, we'll join.
	option = {
		name = senators_little_helpers_faction_events.5.a

		# For now, AI will always join.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] senators_little_helpers_faction_events.5.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		join_from_faction = yes

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] senators_little_helpers_faction_events.5.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# We work alone.
	option = {
		name = senators_little_helpers_faction_events.5.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] senators_little_helpers_faction_events.5.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = rejected_invitation_to_senators_little_helpers }
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_senators_little_helpers_member = yes }
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_opinion_modifier = {
						target = PREV
						modifier = rejected_invitation_to_senators_little_helpers
					}
				}
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = PREV
					modifier = rejected_invitation_to_senators_little_helpers
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = senators_little_helpers_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] senators_little_helpers_faction_events.5.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

				factor = 1

			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] texan_economic_union_faction_events.1.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.

			hidden_effect = {

			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_texan_economic_union_member = yes }

						target = PREV
						modifier = rejected_invitation_to_texan_economic_union
					}
				}

					target = PREV

country_event = {
	id = unbroken_coast_faction_events.1
	title = unbroken_coast_faction_events.1.t
	desc = unbroken_coast_faction_events.1.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Allow them to join.
	option = {
		name = unbroken_coast_faction_events.1.a

		# For now, AI will always accept new members.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] unbroken_coast_faction_events.1.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = unbroken_coast_faction_events.2 }
			join_unbroken_coast = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				every_other_country = {
					news_event = { id = unbroken_coast_faction_events.4 }
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] unbroken_coast_faction_events.1.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# Decline their request.
	option = {
		name = unbroken_coast_faction_events.1.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] unbroken_coast_faction_events.1.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = unbroken_coast_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] unbroken_coast_faction_events.1.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}

# Welcome aboard!
news_event = {
	id = unbroken_coast_faction_events.2
	title = unbroken_coast_faction_events.2.t
	desc = unbroken_coast_faction_events.2.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = unbroken_coast_faction_events.2.a
	}
}

# No thanks, we'll pass.
news_event = {
	id = unbroken_coast_faction_events.3
	title = unbroken_coast_faction_events.3.t
	desc = unbroken_coast_faction_events.3.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = unbroken_coast_faction_events.3.a
	}
}

# Hey everybody, come meet my new friend!
news_event = {
	id = unbroken_coast_faction_events.4
	title = unbroken_coast_faction_events.4.t
	desc = unbroken_coast_faction_events.4.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = unbroken_coast_faction_events.4.a
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = unbroken_coast_faction_events.5
	title = unbroken_coast_faction_events.5.t
	desc = unbroken_coast_faction_events.5.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Sure, we'll join.
	option = {
		name = unbroken_coast_faction_events.5.a

		# For now, AI will always join.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] unbroken_coast_faction_events.5.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		join_from_faction = yes

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] unbroken_coast_faction_events.5.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# We work alone.
	option = {
		name = unbroken_coast_faction_events.5.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] unbroken_coast_faction_events.5.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = rejected_invitation_to_unbroken_coast }
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_unbroken_coast_member = yes }
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_opinion_modifier = {
						target = PREV
						modifier = rejected_invitation_to_unbroken_coast
					}
				}
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = PREV
					modifier = rejected_invitation_to_unbroken_coast
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = unbroken_coast_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] unbroken_coast_faction_events.5.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}
add_namespace = western_enclave_faction_events

country_event = {
	id = western_enclave_faction_events.1
	title = western_enclave_faction_events.1.t
	desc = western_enclave_faction_events.1.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Allow them to join.
	option = {
		name = western_enclave_faction_events.1.a

		# For now, AI will always accept new members.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] western_enclave_faction_events.1.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = western_enclave_faction_events.2 }
			join_western_enclave = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				every_other_country = {
					news_event = { id = western_enclave_faction_events.4 }
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] western_enclave_faction_events.1.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# Decline their request.
	option = {
		name = western_enclave_faction_events.1.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] western_enclave_faction_events.1.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = western_enclave_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] western_enclave_faction_events.1.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = western_enclave_faction_events.5
	title = western_enclave_faction_events.5.t
	desc = western_enclave_faction_events.5.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Sure, we'll join.
	option = {
		name = western_enclave_faction_events.5.a

		# For now, AI will always join.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] western_enclave_faction_events.5.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		join_from_faction = yes

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] western_enclave_faction_events.5.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# We work alone.
	option = {
		name = western_enclave_faction_events.5.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] western_enclave_faction_events.5.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = rejected_invitation_to_western_enclave }
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_western_enclave_member = yes }
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_opinion_modifier = {
						target = PREV
						modifier = rejected_invitation_to_western_enclave
					}
				}
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = PREV
					modifier = rejected_invitation_to_western_enclave
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = western_enclave_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] western_enclave_faction_events.5.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = breach_ferals_faction_events.1
	title = breach_ferals_faction_events.1.t
	desc = breach_ferals_faction_events.1.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Allow them to join.
	option = {
		name = breach_ferals_faction_events.1.a

		# For now, AI will always accept new members.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] breach_ferals_faction_events.1.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = breach_ferals_faction_events.2 }
			join_breach_ferals = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				every_other_country = {
					news_event = { id = breach_ferals_faction_events.4 }
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] breach_ferals_faction_events.1.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# Decline their request.
	option = {
		name = breach_ferals_faction_events.1.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] breach_ferals_faction_events.1.b (event_option) entered"

				limit = { is_breach_ferals_member = yes }

country_event = {
	id = white_sands_compact_faction_events.1
	title = white_sands_compact_faction_events.1.t
	desc = white_sands_compact_faction_events.1.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Allow them to join.
	option = {
		name = white_sands_compact_faction_events.1.a

		# For now, AI will always accept new members.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] white_sands_compact_faction_events.1.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = white_sands_compact_faction_events.2 }
			join_white_sands_compact = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				every_other_country = {
					news_event = { id = white_sands_compact_faction_events.4 }
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] white_sands_compact_faction_events.1.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# Decline their request.
	option = {
		name = white_sands_compact_faction_events.1.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] white_sands_compact_faction_events.1.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = white_sands_compact_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] white_sands_compact_faction_events.1.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}

# Welcome aboard!
news_event = {
	id = white_sands_compact_faction_events.2
	title = white_sands_compact_faction_events.2.t
	desc = white_sands_compact_faction_events.2.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = white_sands_compact_faction_events.2.a
	}
}

# No thanks, we'll pass.
news_event = {
	id = white_sands_compact_faction_events.3
	title = white_sands_compact_faction_events.3.t
	desc = white_sands_compact_faction_events.3.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = white_sands_compact_faction_events.3.a
	}
}

# Hey everybody, come meet my new friend!
news_event = {
	id = white_sands_compact_faction_events.4
	title = white_sands_compact_faction_events.4.t
	desc = white_sands_compact_faction_events.4.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = white_sands_compact_faction_events.4.a
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = white_sands_compact_faction_events.5
	title = white_sands_compact_faction_events.5.t
	desc = white_sands_compact_faction_events.5.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Sure, we'll join.
	option = {
		name = white_sands_compact_faction_events.5.a

		# For now, AI will always join.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] white_sands_compact_faction_events.5.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		join_from_faction = yes

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] white_sands_compact_faction_events.5.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# We work alone.
	option = {
		name = white_sands_compact_faction_events.5.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] white_sands_compact_faction_events.5.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = rejected_invitation_to_white_sands_compact }
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_white_sands_compact_member = yes }
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_opinion_modifier = {
						target = PREV
						modifier = rejected_invitation_to_white_sands_compact
					}
				}
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = PREV
					modifier = rejected_invitation_to_white_sands_compact
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = white_sands_compact_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] white_sands_compact_faction_events.5.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}
add_namespace = cartel_faction_faction_events

country_event = {
	id = cartel_faction_faction_events.1
	title = cartel_faction_faction_events.1.t
	desc = cartel_faction_faction_events.1.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Allow them to join.
	option = {
		name = cartel_faction_faction_events.1.a

		# For now, AI will always accept new members.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] cartel_faction_faction_events.1.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = cartel_faction_faction_events.2 }
			join_cartel_faction = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				every_other_country = {
					news_event = { id = cartel_faction_faction_events.4 }
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] cartel_faction_faction_events.1.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# Decline their request.
	option = {
		name = cartel_faction_faction_events.1.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] cartel_faction_faction_events.1.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = cartel_faction_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] cartel_faction_faction_events.1.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = cartel_faction_faction_events.5
	title = cartel_faction_faction_events.5.t
	desc = cartel_faction_faction_events.5.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Sure, we'll join.
	option = {
		name = cartel_faction_faction_events.5.a

		# For now, AI will always join.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] cartel_faction_faction_events.5.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		join_from_faction = yes

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] cartel_faction_faction_events.5.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# We work alone.
	option = {
		name = cartel_faction_faction_events.5.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] cartel_faction_faction_events.5.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = rejected_invitation_to_cartel_faction }
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_cartel_faction_member = yes }
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_opinion_modifier = {
						target = PREV
						modifier = rejected_invitation_to_cartel_faction
					}
				}
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = PREV
					modifier = rejected_invitation_to_cartel_faction
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = cartel_faction_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] cartel_faction_faction_events.5.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Allow them to join.

		name = new_california_faction_events.1.a

		# For now, AI will always accept new members.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] new_california_faction_events.1.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = new_california_faction_events.2 }
			join_new_california = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				every_other_country = {
					news_event = { id = new_california_faction_events.4 }
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] new_california_faction_events.1.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# Decline their request.
	option = {
		name = new_california_faction_events.1.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] new_california_faction_events.1.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = new_california_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] new_california_faction_events.1.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}

# Welcome aboard!
news_event = {
	id = new_california_faction_events.2
	title = new_california_faction_events.2.t
	desc = new_california_faction_events.2.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = new_california_faction_events.2.a
	}
}

# No thanks, we'll pass.
news_event = {
	id = new_california_faction_events.3
	title = new_california_faction_events.3.t
	desc = new_california_faction_events.3.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = new_california_faction_events.3.a
	}
}

# Hey everybody, come meet my new friend!
news_event = {
	id = new_california_faction_events.4
	title = new_california_faction_events.4.t
	desc = new_california_faction_events.4.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = new_california_faction_events.4.a
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = new_california_faction_events.5
	title = new_california_faction_events.5.t
	desc = new_california_faction_events.5.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Sure, we'll join.
	option = {
		name = new_california_faction_events.5.a

		# For now, AI will always join.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] new_california_faction_events.5.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		join_from_faction = yes

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] new_california_faction_events.5.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# We work alone.
	option = {
		name = new_california_faction_events.5.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] new_california_faction_events.5.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = rejected_invitation_to_new_california }
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_new_california_member = yes }
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_opinion_modifier = {
						target = PREV
						modifier = rejected_invitation_to_new_california
					}
				}
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = PREV
					modifier = rejected_invitation_to_new_california
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = new_california_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] new_california_faction_events.5.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}
add_namespace = the_second_coalition_faction_events

country_event = {
	id = the_second_coalition_faction_events.1
	title = the_second_coalition_faction_events.1.t
	desc = the_second_coalition_faction_events.1.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Allow them to join.
	option = {
		name = the_second_coalition_faction_events.1.a

		# For now, AI will always accept new members.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] the_second_coalition_faction_events.1.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = the_second_coalition_faction_events.2 }
			join_the_second_coalition = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				every_other_country = {
					news_event = { id = the_second_coalition_faction_events.4 }
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] the_second_coalition_faction_events.1.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# Decline their request.
	option = {
		name = the_second_coalition_faction_events.1.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] the_second_coalition_faction_events.1.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = the_second_coalition_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] the_second_coalition_faction_events.1.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}

	id = the_second_coalition_faction_events.4
	title = the_second_coalition_faction_events.4.t
	desc = the_second_coalition_faction_events.4.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = the_second_coalition_faction_events.4.a
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = the_second_coalition_faction_events.5
	title = the_second_coalition_faction_events.5.t
	desc = the_second_coalition_faction_events.5.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Sure, we'll join.
	option = {
		name = the_second_coalition_faction_events.5.a

		# For now, AI will always join.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] the_second_coalition_faction_events.5.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		join_from_faction = yes

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] the_second_coalition_faction_events.5.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# We work alone.
	option = {
		name = the_second_coalition_faction_events.5.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] the_second_coalition_faction_events.5.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = rejected_invitation_to_the_second_coalition }
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_the_second_coalition_member = yes }
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_opinion_modifier = {
						target = PREV
						modifier = rejected_invitation_to_the_second_coalition
					}
				}
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = PREV
					modifier = rejected_invitation_to_the_second_coalition
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = the_second_coalition_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] the_second_coalition_faction_events.5.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = mexican_league_faction_events.1
	title = mexican_league_faction_events.1.t
	desc = mexican_league_faction_events.1.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Allow them to join.
	option = {
		name = mexican_league_faction_events.1.a

		# For now, AI will always accept new members.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] mexican_league_faction_events.1.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = mexican_league_faction_events.2 }
			join_mexican_league = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				every_other_country = {
					news_event = { id = mexican_league_faction_events.4 }
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] mexican_league_faction_events.1.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# Decline their request.
	option = {
		name = mexican_league_faction_events.1.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] mexican_league_faction_events.1.b (event_option) entered"

			}

						target = PREV

country_event = {
	id = midnight_union_faction_events.1
	title = midnight_union_faction_events.1.t
	desc = midnight_union_faction_events.1.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Allow them to join.
	option = {
		name = midnight_union_faction_events.1.a

		# For now, AI will always accept new members.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] midnight_union_faction_events.1.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = midnight_union_faction_events.2 }
			join_midnight_union = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				every_other_country = {
					news_event = { id = midnight_union_faction_events.4 }
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] midnight_union_faction_events.1.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# Decline their request.
	option = {
		name = midnight_union_faction_events.1.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] midnight_union_faction_events.1.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = midnight_union_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] midnight_union_faction_events.1.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}

# Welcome aboard!
news_event = {
	id = midnight_union_faction_events.2
	title = midnight_union_faction_events.2.t
	desc = midnight_union_faction_events.2.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = midnight_union_faction_events.2.a
	}
}

# No thanks, we'll pass.
news_event = {
	id = midnight_union_faction_events.3
	title = midnight_union_faction_events.3.t
	desc = midnight_union_faction_events.3.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = midnight_union_faction_events.3.a
	}
}

# Hey everybody, come meet my new friend!
news_event = {
	id = midnight_union_faction_events.4
	title = midnight_union_faction_events.4.t
	desc = midnight_union_faction_events.4.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = midnight_union_faction_events.4.a
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = midnight_union_faction_events.5
	title = midnight_union_faction_events.5.t
	desc = midnight_union_faction_events.5.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Sure, we'll join.
	option = {
		name = midnight_union_faction_events.5.a

		# For now, AI will always join.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] midnight_union_faction_events.5.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		join_from_faction = yes

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] midnight_union_faction_events.5.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# We work alone.
	option = {
		name = midnight_union_faction_events.5.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] midnight_union_faction_events.5.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = rejected_invitation_to_midnight_union }
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_midnight_union_member = yes }
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_opinion_modifier = {
						target = PREV
						modifier = rejected_invitation_to_midnight_union
					}
				}
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = PREV
					modifier = rejected_invitation_to_midnight_union
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = midnight_union_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] midnight_union_faction_events.5.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}
add_namespace = big_circle_faction_events

country_event = {
	id = big_circle_faction_events.1
	title = big_circle_faction_events.1.t
	desc = big_circle_faction_events.1.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Allow them to join.
	option = {
		name = big_circle_faction_events.1.a

		# For now, AI will always accept new members.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] big_circle_faction_events.1.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = big_circle_faction_events.2 }
			join_big_circle = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				every_other_country = {
					news_event = { id = big_circle_faction_events.4 }
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] big_circle_faction_events.1.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# Decline their request.
	option = {
		name = big_circle_faction_events.1.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] big_circle_faction_events.1.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = big_circle_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] big_circle_faction_events.1.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = big_circle_faction_events.5
	title = big_circle_faction_events.5.t
	desc = big_circle_faction_events.5.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Sure, we'll join.
	option = {
		name = big_circle_faction_events.5.a

		# For now, AI will always join.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] big_circle_faction_events.5.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		join_from_faction = yes

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] big_circle_faction_events.5.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# We work alone.
	option = {
		name = big_circle_faction_events.5.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] big_circle_faction_events.5.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = rejected_invitation_to_big_circle }
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_big_circle_member = yes }
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_opinion_modifier = {
						target = PREV
						modifier = rejected_invitation_to_big_circle
					}
				}
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = PREV
					modifier = rejected_invitation_to_big_circle
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = big_circle_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] big_circle_faction_events.5.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}

			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] dharma_way_faction_events.5.b (event_option) entered"

				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = rejected_invitation_to_dharma_way }
			}

				hidden_effect = {
					remove_opinion_modifier = {
						target = PREV
						modifier = rejected_invitation_to_dharma_way

					target = PREV

			hidden_effect = {

			modifier = {
				factor = 0

			}

				limit = { is_californian_hegemony_member = yes }
				hidden_effect = {

						target = PREV
						modifier = rejected_invitation_to_californian_hegemony
					}
				}
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = PREV
					modifier = rejected_invitation_to_californian_hegemony

			}
		}

news_event = {
	id = northern_congress_faction_events.4
	title = northern_congress_faction_events.4.t
	desc = northern_congress_faction_events.4.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = northern_congress_faction_events.4.a
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = northern_congress_faction_events.5
	title = northern_congress_faction_events.5.t
	desc = northern_congress_faction_events.5.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Sure, we'll join.
	option = {
		name = northern_congress_faction_events.5.a

		# For now, AI will always join.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] northern_congress_faction_events.5.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		join_from_faction = yes

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] northern_congress_faction_events.5.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# We work alone.
	option = {
		name = northern_congress_faction_events.5.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] northern_congress_faction_events.5.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = rejected_invitation_to_northern_congress }
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_northern_congress_member = yes }
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_opinion_modifier = {
						target = PREV
						modifier = rejected_invitation_to_northern_congress
					}
				}
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = PREV
					modifier = rejected_invitation_to_northern_congress
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = northern_congress_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] northern_congress_faction_events.5.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}
add_namespace = road_warriors_faction_events

country_event = {
	id = road_warriors_faction_events.1
	title = road_warriors_faction_events.1.t
	desc = road_warriors_faction_events.1.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Allow them to join.
	option = {
		name = road_warriors_faction_events.1.a

		# For now, AI will always accept new members.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] road_warriors_faction_events.1.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = road_warriors_faction_events.2 }
			join_road_warriors = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				every_other_country = {
					news_event = { id = road_warriors_faction_events.4 }
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] road_warriors_faction_events.1.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# Decline their request.
	option = {
		name = road_warriors_faction_events.1.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] road_warriors_faction_events.1.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = road_warriors_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] road_warriors_faction_events.1.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}

# Welcome aboard!

	id = road_warriors_faction_events.2

	desc = road_warriors_faction_events.4.d

	}

country_event = {
	id = road_warriors_faction_events.5
	title = road_warriors_faction_events.5.t
	desc = road_warriors_faction_events.5.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Sure, we'll join.
	option = {
		name = road_warriors_faction_events.5.a

		# For now, AI will always join.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] road_warriors_faction_events.5.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		join_from_faction = yes

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] road_warriors_faction_events.5.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# We work alone.
	option = {
		name = road_warriors_faction_events.5.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] road_warriors_faction_events.5.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = rejected_invitation_to_road_warriors }
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_road_warriors_member = yes }
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_opinion_modifier = {
						target = PREV
						modifier = rejected_invitation_to_road_warriors
					}
				}
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = PREV
					modifier = rejected_invitation_to_road_warriors
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = road_warriors_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] road_warriors_faction_events.5.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = synergy_alliance_faction_events.1
	title = synergy_alliance_faction_events.1.t
	desc = synergy_alliance_faction_events.1.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Allow them to join.

		name = synergy_alliance_faction_events.1.a

		# For now, AI will always accept new members.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {

			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] synergy_alliance_faction_events.1.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = synergy_alliance_faction_events.2 }
			join_synergy_alliance = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				every_other_country = {
					news_event = { id = synergy_alliance_faction_events.4 }
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] synergy_alliance_faction_events.1.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# Decline their request.

		name = synergy_alliance_faction_events.1.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }

			modifier = {
				factor = 0

			}

				factor = 1

			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] vulpes_legion_faction_events.1.a (event_option) entered"

		# And here's where they'll actually join.

			join_vulpes_legion = yes

			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] aurelius_legion_faction_events.5.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		join_from_faction = yes

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] aurelius_legion_faction_events.5.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# We work alone.
	option = {
		name = aurelius_legion_faction_events.5.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] aurelius_legion_faction_events.5.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = rejected_invitation_to_aurelius_legion }
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_aurelius_legion_member = yes }
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_opinion_modifier = {
						target = PREV
						modifier = rejected_invitation_to_aurelius_legion
					}
				}
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = PREV
					modifier = rejected_invitation_to_aurelius_legion
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = aurelius_legion_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] aurelius_legion_faction_events.5.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}
add_namespace = lanius_legion_faction_events

country_event = {
	id = lanius_legion_faction_events.1
	title = lanius_legion_faction_events.1.t
	desc = lanius_legion_faction_events.1.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Allow them to join.
	option = {
		name = lanius_legion_faction_events.1.a

		# For now, AI will always accept new members.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] lanius_legion_faction_events.1.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = lanius_legion_faction_events.2 }
			join_lanius_legion = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				every_other_country = {
					news_event = { id = lanius_legion_faction_events.4 }
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] lanius_legion_faction_events.1.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# Decline their request.
	option = {
		name = lanius_legion_faction_events.1.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] lanius_legion_faction_events.1.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = lanius_legion_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] lanius_legion_faction_events.1.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}

	title = lanius_legion_faction_events.4.t
	desc = lanius_legion_faction_events.4.d

	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = lanius_legion_faction_events.4.a
	}

country_event = {
	id = lanius_legion_faction_events.5
	title = lanius_legion_faction_events.5.t
	desc = lanius_legion_faction_events.5.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Sure, we'll join.
	option = {
		name = lanius_legion_faction_events.5.a

		# For now, AI will always join.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] lanius_legion_faction_events.5.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		join_from_faction = yes

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] lanius_legion_faction_events.5.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# We work alone.
	option = {
		name = lanius_legion_faction_events.5.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] lanius_legion_faction_events.5.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = rejected_invitation_to_lanius_legion }
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_lanius_legion_member = yes }
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_opinion_modifier = {
						target = PREV
						modifier = rejected_invitation_to_lanius_legion
					}
				}
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = PREV
					modifier = rejected_invitation_to_lanius_legion
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = lanius_legion_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] lanius_legion_faction_events.5.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}

				factor = 1

			}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] malpais_legion_faction_events.5.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = rejected_invitation_to_malpais_legion }
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_malpais_legion_member = yes }
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_opinion_modifier = {
						target = PREV
						modifier = rejected_invitation_to_malpais_legion
					}
				}
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = PREV
					modifier = rejected_invitation_to_malpais_legion
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = malpais_legion_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] malpais_legion_faction_events.5.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}
add_namespace = northern_union_faction_events

country_event = {
	id = northern_union_faction_events.1
	title = northern_union_faction_events.1.t
	desc = northern_union_faction_events.1.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Allow them to join.
	option = {
		name = northern_union_faction_events.1.a

		# For now, AI will always accept new members.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] northern_union_faction_events.1.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = northern_union_faction_events.2 }
			join_northern_union = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				every_other_country = {
					news_event = { id = northern_union_faction_events.4 }
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] northern_union_faction_events.1.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# Decline their request.
	option = {
		name = northern_union_faction_events.1.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] northern_union_faction_events.1.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = northern_union_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] northern_union_faction_events.1.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}

# Welcome aboard!
news_event = {
	id = northern_union_faction_events.2
	title = northern_union_faction_events.2.t
	desc = northern_union_faction_events.2.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

		name = northern_union_faction_events.2.a
	}

# No thanks, we'll pass.
news_event = {
	id = northern_union_faction_events.3
	title = northern_union_faction_events.3.t
	desc = northern_union_faction_events.3.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = northern_union_faction_events.3.a
	}
}

# Hey everybody, come meet my new friend!
news_event = {
	id = northern_union_faction_events.4
	title = northern_union_faction_events.4.t
	desc = northern_union_faction_events.4.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = northern_union_faction_events.4.a
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = northern_union_faction_events.5
	title = northern_union_faction_events.5.t
	desc = northern_union_faction_events.5.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Sure, we'll join.
	option = {
		name = northern_union_faction_events.5.a

		# For now, AI will always join.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] northern_union_faction_events.5.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		join_from_faction = yes

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] northern_union_faction_events.5.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# We work alone.
	option = {
		name = northern_union_faction_events.5.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] northern_union_faction_events.5.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = rejected_invitation_to_northern_union }
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_northern_union_member = yes }
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_opinion_modifier = {
						target = PREV
						modifier = rejected_invitation_to_northern_union
					}
				}
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = PREV
					modifier = rejected_invitation_to_northern_union
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = northern_union_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] northern_union_faction_events.5.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = bloody_electorals_faction_events.1
	title = bloody_electorals_faction_events.1.t
	desc = bloody_electorals_faction_events.1.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Allow them to join.
	option = {
		name = bloody_electorals_faction_events.1.a

		# For now, AI will always accept new members.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] bloody_electorals_faction_events.1.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = bloody_electorals_faction_events.2 }
			join_bloody_electorals = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				every_other_country = {
					news_event = { id = bloody_electorals_faction_events.4 }
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] bloody_electorals_faction_events.1.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# Decline their request.
	option = {
		name = bloody_electorals_faction_events.1.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] bloody_electorals_faction_events.1.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = bloody_electorals_faction_events.3 }
		}

			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] bloody_electorals_faction_events.1.b (event_option) exited"
		}

	desc = bloody_electorals_faction_events.5.d

			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {

			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] bloody_electorals_faction_events.5.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		name = bloody_electorals_faction_events.5.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] bloody_electorals_faction_events.5.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = rejected_invitation_to_bloody_electorals }
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_bloody_electorals_member = yes }
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_opinion_modifier = {
						target = PREV
						modifier = rejected_invitation_to_bloody_electorals
					}
				}
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = PREV
					modifier = rejected_invitation_to_bloody_electorals

			}

			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}

			}

				limit = { is_canadian_watchdogs_member = yes }
				hidden_effect = {

						target = PREV
						modifier = rejected_invitation_to_canadian_watchdogs
					}
				}

					target = PREV

	title = kingdom_of_manitoba_faction_events.1.t
	desc = kingdom_of_manitoba_faction_events.1.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Allow them to join.
	option = {
		name = kingdom_of_manitoba_faction_events.1.a

		# For now, AI will always accept new members.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] kingdom_of_manitoba_faction_events.1.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = kingdom_of_manitoba_faction_events.2 }
			join_kingdom_of_manitoba = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				every_other_country = {
					news_event = { id = kingdom_of_manitoba_faction_events.4 }
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] kingdom_of_manitoba_faction_events.1.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# Decline their request.
	option = {
		name = kingdom_of_manitoba_faction_events.1.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] kingdom_of_manitoba_faction_events.1.b (event_option) entered"
		}

	title = kingdom_of_manitoba_faction_events.5.t
	desc = kingdom_of_manitoba_faction_events.5.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Sure, we'll join.
	option = {
		name = kingdom_of_manitoba_faction_events.5.a

		# For now, AI will always join.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] kingdom_of_manitoba_faction_events.5.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		join_from_faction = yes

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] kingdom_of_manitoba_faction_events.5.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# We work alone.
	option = {
		name = kingdom_of_manitoba_faction_events.5.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] kingdom_of_manitoba_faction_events.5.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = rejected_invitation_to_kingdom_of_manitoba }
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_kingdom_of_manitoba_member = yes }
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_opinion_modifier = {
						target = PREV
						modifier = rejected_invitation_to_kingdom_of_manitoba
					}
				}
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = PREV
					modifier = rejected_invitation_to_kingdom_of_manitoba
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = kingdom_of_manitoba_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] kingdom_of_manitoba_faction_events.5.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}
add_namespace = united_wallers_faction_events

country_event = {
	id = united_wallers_faction_events.1
	title = united_wallers_faction_events.1.t
	desc = united_wallers_faction_events.1.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Allow them to join.
	option = {
		name = united_wallers_faction_events.1.a

		# For now, AI will always accept new members.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] united_wallers_faction_events.1.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = united_wallers_faction_events.2 }
			join_united_wallers = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				every_other_country = {
					news_event = { id = united_wallers_faction_events.4 }
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] united_wallers_faction_events.1.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# Decline their request.
	option = {
		name = united_wallers_faction_events.1.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] united_wallers_faction_events.1.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = united_wallers_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] united_wallers_faction_events.1.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}

# Welcome aboard!
news_event = {
	id = united_wallers_faction_events.2
	title = united_wallers_faction_events.2.t
	desc = united_wallers_faction_events.2.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = united_wallers_faction_events.2.a
	}
}

# No thanks, we'll pass.
news_event = {
	id = united_wallers_faction_events.3
	title = united_wallers_faction_events.3.t
	desc = united_wallers_faction_events.3.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = united_wallers_faction_events.3.a
	}
}

# Hey everybody, come meet my new friend!
news_event = {
	id = united_wallers_faction_events.4
	title = united_wallers_faction_events.4.t
	desc = united_wallers_faction_events.4.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = united_wallers_faction_events.4.a
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = united_wallers_faction_events.5
	title = united_wallers_faction_events.5.t
	desc = united_wallers_faction_events.5.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Sure, we'll join.
	option = {
		name = united_wallers_faction_events.5.a

		# For now, AI will always join.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] united_wallers_faction_events.5.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		join_from_faction = yes

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] united_wallers_faction_events.5.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# We work alone.
	option = {
		name = united_wallers_faction_events.5.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] united_wallers_faction_events.5.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = rejected_invitation_to_united_wallers }
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_united_wallers_member = yes }
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_opinion_modifier = {
						target = PREV
						modifier = rejected_invitation_to_united_wallers
					}
				}
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = PREV
					modifier = rejected_invitation_to_united_wallers
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = united_wallers_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] united_wallers_faction_events.5.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}
add_namespace = montana_enclave_faction_events

country_event = {
	id = montana_enclave_faction_events.1
	title = montana_enclave_faction_events.1.t
	desc = montana_enclave_faction_events.1.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Allow them to join.
	option = {
		name = montana_enclave_faction_events.1.a

		# For now, AI will always accept new members.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] montana_enclave_faction_events.1.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = montana_enclave_faction_events.2 }
			join_montana_enclave = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				every_other_country = {
					news_event = { id = montana_enclave_faction_events.4 }
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] montana_enclave_faction_events.1.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# Decline their request.
	option = {
		name = montana_enclave_faction_events.1.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] montana_enclave_faction_events.1.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = montana_enclave_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] montana_enclave_faction_events.1.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}

	desc = montana_enclave_faction_events.4.d

country_event = {
	id = montana_enclave_faction_events.5
	title = montana_enclave_faction_events.5.t
	desc = montana_enclave_faction_events.5.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Sure, we'll join.
	option = {
		name = montana_enclave_faction_events.5.a

		# For now, AI will always join.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] montana_enclave_faction_events.5.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		join_from_faction = yes

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] montana_enclave_faction_events.5.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# We work alone.
	option = {
		name = montana_enclave_faction_events.5.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] montana_enclave_faction_events.5.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = rejected_invitation_to_montana_enclave }
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_montana_enclave_member = yes }
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_opinion_modifier = {
						target = PREV
						modifier = rejected_invitation_to_montana_enclave
					}
				}
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = PREV
					modifier = rejected_invitation_to_montana_enclave
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = montana_enclave_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] montana_enclave_faction_events.5.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}

			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] northern_winds_faction_events.5.a (event_option) entered"
		}

			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] northern_winds_faction_events.5.a (event_option) exited"
		}

	option = {
		name = northern_winds_faction_events.5.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] northern_winds_faction_events.5.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = rejected_invitation_to_northern_winds }
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_northern_winds_member = yes }
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_opinion_modifier = {
						target = PREV
						modifier = rejected_invitation_to_northern_winds
					}
				}
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = PREV
					modifier = rejected_invitation_to_northern_winds
				}

			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] northern_winds_faction_events.5.b (event_option) exited"
