country_event = {
	id = allied_states_faction_events.1
	title = allied_states_faction_events.1.t
	desc = allied_states_faction_events.1.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Allow them to join.
	option = {
		name = allied_states_faction_events.1.a

		# For now, AI will always accept new members.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] allied_states_faction_events.1.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = allied_states_faction_events.2 }
			join_allied_states = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				every_other_country = {
					news_event = { id = allied_states_faction_events.4 }
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] allied_states_faction_events.1.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# Decline their request.
	option = {
		name = allied_states_faction_events.1.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] allied_states_faction_events.1.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = allied_states_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] allied_states_faction_events.1.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

			}
		}

				factor = 0

			}

		}

				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = rejected_invitation_to_allied_states }
			}

				limit = { is_allied_states_member = yes }
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_opinion_modifier = {
						target = PREV
						modifier = rejected_invitation_to_allied_states
					}
				}
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = PREV
					modifier = rejected_invitation_to_allied_states
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = allied_states_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] allied_states_faction_events.5.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

country_event = {
	id = fifth_world_faction_events.1
	title = fifth_world_faction_events.1.t
	desc = fifth_world_faction_events.1.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Allow them to join.
	option = {
		name = fifth_world_faction_events.1.a

		# For now, AI will always accept new members.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] fifth_world_faction_events.1.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = fifth_world_faction_events.2 }
			join_fifth_world = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				every_other_country = {
					news_event = { id = fifth_world_faction_events.4 }
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] fifth_world_faction_events.1.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# Decline their request.
	option = {
		name = fifth_world_faction_events.1.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] fifth_world_faction_events.1.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = fifth_world_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] fifth_world_faction_events.1.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}

# Welcome aboard!
news_event = {
	id = fifth_world_faction_events.2
	title = fifth_world_faction_events.2.t
	desc = fifth_world_faction_events.2.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = fifth_world_faction_events.2.a
	}
}

# No thanks, we'll pass.
news_event = {
	id = fifth_world_faction_events.3
	title = fifth_world_faction_events.3.t
	desc = fifth_world_faction_events.3.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = fifth_world_faction_events.3.a
	}
}

# Hey everybody, come meet my new friend!
news_event = {
	id = fifth_world_faction_events.4
	title = fifth_world_faction_events.4.t
	desc = fifth_world_faction_events.4.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = fifth_world_faction_events.4.a
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = fifth_world_faction_events.5
	title = fifth_world_faction_events.5.t
	desc = fifth_world_faction_events.5.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Sure, we'll join.
	option = {
		name = fifth_world_faction_events.5.a

		# For now, AI will always join.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] fifth_world_faction_events.5.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		join_from_faction = yes

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] fifth_world_faction_events.5.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# We work alone.
	option = {
		name = fifth_world_faction_events.5.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] fifth_world_faction_events.5.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = rejected_invitation_to_fifth_world }
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_fifth_world_member = yes }
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_opinion_modifier = {
						target = PREV
						modifier = rejected_invitation_to_fifth_world
					}
				}
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = PREV
					modifier = rejected_invitation_to_fifth_world
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = fifth_world_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] fifth_world_faction_events.5.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}
add_namespace = red_shield_faction_events

country_event = {
	id = red_shield_faction_events.1
	title = red_shield_faction_events.1.t
	desc = red_shield_faction_events.1.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Allow them to join.
	option = {
		name = red_shield_faction_events.1.a

		# For now, AI will always accept new members.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] red_shield_faction_events.1.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = red_shield_faction_events.2 }
			join_red_shield = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				every_other_country = {
					news_event = { id = red_shield_faction_events.4 }
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] red_shield_faction_events.1.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# Decline their request.
	option = {
		name = red_shield_faction_events.1.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] red_shield_faction_events.1.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = red_shield_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] red_shield_faction_events.1.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = red_shield_faction_events.5
	title = red_shield_faction_events.5.t
	desc = red_shield_faction_events.5.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Sure, we'll join.
	option = {
		name = red_shield_faction_events.5.a

		# For now, AI will always join.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] red_shield_faction_events.5.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		join_from_faction = yes

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] red_shield_faction_events.5.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# We work alone.
	option = {
		name = red_shield_faction_events.5.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] red_shield_faction_events.5.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = rejected_invitation_to_red_shield }
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_red_shield_member = yes }
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_opinion_modifier = {
						target = PREV
						modifier = rejected_invitation_to_red_shield
					}
				}
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = PREV
					modifier = rejected_invitation_to_red_shield
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = red_shield_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] red_shield_faction_events.5.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = wardens_of_white_faction_events.1
	title = wardens_of_white_faction_events.1.t
	desc = wardens_of_white_faction_events.1.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Allow them to join.

			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}

			news_event = { id = wardens_of_white_faction_events.2 }
			join_wardens_of_white = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				every_other_country = {
					news_event = { id = wardens_of_white_faction_events.4 }
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] wardens_of_white_faction_events.1.a (event_option) exited"
		}

			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0

			}

	title = wardens_of_white_faction_events.5.t
	desc = wardens_of_white_faction_events.5.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] wardens_of_white_faction_events.5.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] wardens_of_white_faction_events.5.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = rejected_invitation_to_wardens_of_white }
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_wardens_of_white_member = yes }
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_opinion_modifier = {
						target = PREV
						modifier = rejected_invitation_to_wardens_of_white
					}
				}
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = PREV
					modifier = rejected_invitation_to_wardens_of_white
				}
			}
		}

country_event = {
	id = miscounts_faction_events.1
	title = miscounts_faction_events.1.t
	desc = miscounts_faction_events.1.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Allow them to join.
	option = {
		name = miscounts_faction_events.1.a

		# For now, AI will always accept new members.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] miscounts_faction_events.1.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = miscounts_faction_events.2 }
			join_miscounts = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				every_other_country = {
					news_event = { id = miscounts_faction_events.4 }
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] miscounts_faction_events.1.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# Decline their request.
	option = {
		name = miscounts_faction_events.1.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] miscounts_faction_events.1.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = miscounts_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] miscounts_faction_events.1.b (event_option) exited"

	desc = miscounts_faction_events.5.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] miscounts_faction_events.5.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		join_from_faction = yes

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] miscounts_faction_events.5.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = miscounts_faction_events.5.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] miscounts_faction_events.5.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = rejected_invitation_to_miscounts }
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_miscounts_member = yes }
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_opinion_modifier = {
						target = PREV
						modifier = rejected_invitation_to_miscounts
					}
				}
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = PREV
					modifier = rejected_invitation_to_miscounts
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = miscounts_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] miscounts_faction_events.5.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

country_event = {
	id = royal_accord_faction_events.1
	title = royal_accord_faction_events.1.t
	desc = royal_accord_faction_events.1.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Allow them to join.

		name = royal_accord_faction_events.1.a

		# For now, AI will always accept new members.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] royal_accord_faction_events.1.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.

			news_event = { id = royal_accord_faction_events.2 }
			join_royal_accord = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				every_other_country = {
					news_event = { id = royal_accord_faction_events.4 }
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] royal_accord_faction_events.1.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# Decline their request.
	option = {
		name = royal_accord_faction_events.1.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] royal_accord_faction_events.1.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = royal_accord_faction_events.3 }
		}

			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }

# Welcome aboard!
news_event = {
	id = royal_accord_faction_events.2
	title = royal_accord_faction_events.2.t
	desc = royal_accord_faction_events.2.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = royal_accord_faction_events.2.a
	}
}

# No thanks, we'll pass.
news_event = {
	id = royal_accord_faction_events.3
	title = royal_accord_faction_events.3.t
	desc = royal_accord_faction_events.3.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = royal_accord_faction_events.3.a
	}
}

# Hey everybody, come meet my new friend!
news_event = {
	id = royal_accord_faction_events.4
	title = royal_accord_faction_events.4.t
	desc = royal_accord_faction_events.4.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = royal_accord_faction_events.4.a
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = royal_accord_faction_events.5
	title = royal_accord_faction_events.5.t
	desc = royal_accord_faction_events.5.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_fascist_speech

	is_triggered_only = yes

	# Sure, we'll join.
	option = {
		name = royal_accord_faction_events.5.a

		# For now, AI will always join.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] royal_accord_faction_events.5.a (event_option) entered"
		}

		# And here's where they'll actually join.
		join_from_faction = yes

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] royal_accord_faction_events.5.a (event_option) exited"
		}
	}

	# We work alone.
	option = {
		name = royal_accord_faction_events.5.b

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				always = yes
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] royal_accord_faction_events.5.b (event_option) entered"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_opinion_modifier = rejected_invitation_to_royal_accord }
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { is_royal_accord_member = yes }
				hidden_effect = {
					remove_opinion_modifier = {
						target = PREV
						modifier = rejected_invitation_to_royal_accord
					}
				}
				add_opinion_modifier = {
					target = PREV
					modifier = rejected_invitation_to_royal_accord
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			news_event = { id = royal_accord_faction_events.3 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = debug_logs }
			log = "[GetDateText]: [This.GetName], [From.GetName] royal_accord_faction_events.5.b (event_option) exited"
		}
	}
}
# vim: set ft=pdx ts=2 sw=2 tw=79 :
